name: Guruguru Animals
storyline:
Help the animals by solving physics-based puzzles with drawings!

Features all sorts of different animals.
Feed the hungry animals with their favourite snacks.
Draw your way through brain teasing puzzles and solve them with physics.
Pick your favourite colour to draw with.
Unlock more stars by finishing the levels faster. Unlock more levels by getting more stars!
Endless unique ways to solve the puzzles!

Can you beat all the levels?

A game made by four Finnish vocational college interns in Japan. The game was completed in two months, and was made for the Google indie games festival 2018.

The game is available in Google Play.
summary: A drawing based physics puzzle game with animals.
